articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Exemplary KPA Service Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Exemplary KPA Service Personnel
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants of the 3rd Meeting of Activists of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in the Movement for Winning the Title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					 When Kim Jong Un arrived at the venue of the photo session, the participants enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest glory and the warmest thanks to him.
					
					 He waved back to their cheers and sent a warm salute to them.
					
					 He warmly congratulated them on their contribution to devotedly defending the party and the revolution on the forefront for safeguarding the country and bolstering the politico-ideological and military and technical capabilities of the KPA. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the participants would fulfill their responsibility and duty for turning all the units of the KPA into the ones like the 7th Regiment of the anti-Japanese guerrilla army and the guards units during the past war by upholding and glorifying leader Kim Jong Il's idea of the mass movement in the army and leadership feats and bringing about a fresh turn in the movement for winning the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and the movement for winning the title of Guards Unit.
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su and Pak Yong Sik.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea led by Chairman Tomohiko Murayama arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Departs
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Departs
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche headed by Takashi Koiwai, vice-chairman of the Japan Matsumoto Citizens Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, left here for home Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Switzerland, a delegation of the Japan Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and other foreign guests visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Korean Central Fine Arts Studio Marks 30th Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Korean Central Fine Arts Studio Marks 30th Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central Fine Arts Studio marked its 30th founding anniversary.
					 The officials and creators of the studio have successfully discharged their mission and role as standard-bearers of the ideological front of the party since the foundation of the studio on Aug. 7, Juche 75 (1986).
					
					 The artists made contribution to the cause of immortalizing the great leaders by creating the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the highest level.
					
					 They also successfully produced the exhibits at such grand monumental buildings as the Korean Revolution Museum, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Okryu Children's Hospital, the Sci-Tech Complex, the Sinchon Museum and the National House of Class Education.
					
					 There took place a meeting to mark the founding anniversary on Saturday.

articles.title: Men's Premier Soccer League for Torch Cup in DPRK
articles.content:
Men's Premier Soccer League for Torch Cup in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A men's premier soccer league for Torch Cup is going on at the Sosan Football Stadium in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, with 14 teams in attendance.
					 The premier league began on July 27.
					
					 According to the league results as of August 5, Sobaeksu and Sonbong teams take the lead in A and B groups, respectively with two wins in two matches.
					
					 3.5 goals per match were recorded on an average.
					
					 Its group round robin will last until August 24 and the semi-finals and the finals of the league are to be held on August 26 and 28.

articles.title: Korean in Japan Protests against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Korean in Japan Protests against THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, released a statement on Aug. 4 in protest against the anachronistic moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 The south Korean puppet regime committed such act of treachery as deciding to introduce THAAD into south Korea despite public opposition and protest at home and abroad, the statement said.
					
					 The statement, reflecting the resentment of all members of the association, vehemently denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for blindly following the U.S. policy hostile to the DPRK and strategy to dominate the world, being utterly indifferent to the aspiration and desire of all Koreans.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. announced that it would kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills, the statement said it is as clear as noonday that the situation on the Korean peninsula will be pushed to the brink of a war.
					
					 Japan's support for THAAD deployment can never be overlooked as it is rushing headlong to emerge a military giant at the prodding of the U.S., it noted.
					
					 It extended firm support and solidarity to the south Koreans in their just struggle for peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Korean Youth in Japan Slam Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Korean Youth in Japan Slam Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
Tokyo, August 5 (KNS-KCNA) -- Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, issued a statement on Aug. 4 denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for its anachronistic moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 When the Park group came under strong protest and fire at home and abroad for claiming that THAAD deployment is "protecting south Korea from the north's nuclear and missile threat", it is suppressing through fascist actions the just struggle of the south Korean people against THAAD, talking about "conflict in the south" and "interference of outside forces."
					
					 Not content with this, the puppet regime is staging Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill together with U.S. forces in a bid to push the situation to an extreme phase, the statement said, branding Park Geun Hye as a sycophant and traitor and war servant without an equal.

articles.title: Natural Energy-based Power Supply System Established
articles.content:
Natural Energy-based Power Supply System Established
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made a progress in the work to utilize natural energies.
					 Its North Phyongan Provincial Power Distribution Station established a power supply system based on the combination of wind and solar electric power systems.
					
					 The technicians settled sci-tech problems for the system and developed direct-current converter, UPS and transformers by their own efforts.
					
					 This power supply system was introduced to the newly-built Baby Home and Orphanage in the city of Sinuiju.

articles.title: Monument to Great Victory in Pukgwan, Testimony to Japan's Vandalism
articles.content:
Monument to Great Victory in Pukgwan, Testimony to Japan's Vandalism
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists plundered many national cultural assets from Korea in the 20th century.
					 Among them is the Monument to the Great Victory in Pukgwan built in 1708 to convey the feats of a Hamgyong provincial volunteer army of Korea who defeated the Japanese aggressors during the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598).
					
					 Inscribed on the monument, 187 cm high, 66 cm wide and 13 cm thick, are more than 1,400 letters that tell about Japan's aggression on Korea and the activities of the Hamgyong provincial volunteer army against it.
					
					 This cultural property was robbed by the Japanese imperialists in 1905 and returned 100 years after to be placed on its original site (Rimmyong-ri, Kim Chaek City in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK).
					
					 The monument serves as a witness not only telling about the righteous and indomitable Korean nation's history of struggles but also indicting the Japanese imperialists for their vandalism and plunder of historical sites and relics.
					
					 Steadfast is the Korean people's will to force Japan to pay for its past crimes without fail.

articles.title: Revolutionary Slogans Put up by Kim Il Sung during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Revolutionary Slogans Put up by Kim Il Sung during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung put up slogans indicating the path and fighting goals of the Korean revolution in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and encouraged the fighters and people to the final victory in the anti-Japanese revolution. 
					 He started his revolutionary activities under the slogan "Go among the People!" 
					
					 The slogan "As Fish Cannot Live without Water, Guerrillas Cannot Live without the People" in which anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners kept in their minds served as an ideological foundation of the army-people great unity for consolidating the blood ties between the fighters and people.  
					
					 He brought up the children's corps members as reliable successors to the revolution and builders of liberated Korea. He put up the slogan to be held high by the children corps members "Let Us Be Always Ready for the Independence of Korea and the Liberation of the Proletarians of the Whole World!"
					
					 He established the shining tradition in the ideological work in the early period of the revolution and brought brilliant victories in the anti-Japanese war by dint of ideology. His feats are reflected in the slogan "Let Us Unite in One Thought and One Purpose" and his Songun revolutionary idea in slogans "Arms Are Our Lifeblood. Arms for Arms!"
					
					 He advanced such revolutionary and militant slogans as "Studying Is Also a Battle!" and "The First Task of the Revolutionaries Is to Study" and "The Korean Revolutionaries Must Know Korea Well".
					
					 His will to accomplish the Korean revolution by the efforts of the Korean people was clearly reflected in the revolutionary slogan "Let Us Carry Out the Korean Revolution by Our Own Efforts!"
					
					 He advanced the slogan "Let Us Make Efforts for the Final Victory in the Anti-Japanese Battle" in May, Juche 34 (1945) on the eve of the final decisive battle with the Japanese imperialists. It served as a banner of victory to make members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, people's armed units and armed uprising organizations turn out in the preparations for final attack operation for liberating the country.

articles.title: KCNA Assails U.S. and Western Countries' Interference in Other Countries' Internal Affairs
articles.content:
KCNA Assails U.S. and Western Countries' Interference in Other Countries' Internal Affairs
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and Japan are leaving no means untried to tarnish the image of the DPRK, asserting that it "does not guarantee the rights of its workers" abroad.
					 Shortly ago, a spokesperson for East Asian and Pacific Affairs of the U.S. Department of State claimed that the "money earned by workers of the DPRK abroad finds its way to the government of north Korea and this is being used exclusively for its illegal nuclear and missile programs" and such problem will be reflected in the sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 Pursuant to its master's scenario, Japan, too, is working hard to seek the adoption of a "resolution" on forcing the DPRK to halt the dispatch of its workers to other countries.
					
					 It failed to include an item calling on foreign countries to prohibit the hiring of DPRK's workers in the UN Security Council "resolution" adopted in January. In the wake of the adoption of another UNSC "resolution" in March it got in touch with individual countries which are hiring workers of the DPRK in a bid to halt the hiring. 
					
					 This is a reckless behavior of those hell-bent on pursuing a hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It has become common practice for countries to have exchange not only in funds and technology but also in manpower in their economic relations and so nobody can find fault with this.
					
					 The DPRK's workers dispatched to foreign countries on the voluntary principle according to the legitimate contracts with them are striving to develop the economy of their country and boost the external economic exchange under working and living conditions as required by international law and the DPRK's law. 
					
					 The U.S. and Japan are peddling this normal economic exchange in the international arena, urging "relevant countries not to hire Korean workers" under the pretext of "human rights abuse." This is a wanton interference in their internal affairs as it seriously infringes upon other countries' sovereignty in order to achieve their sinister goals. 
					
					 It is the U.S. and western countries that are now putting collective pressure upon those countries which maintain their unique system and political mode under the pretext of "human rights abuses" in quest of their unilateral interests irrelevant to human rights.
					
					 Countries' sovereignty is being violated and their national development seriously retarded worldwide owing to the hostile forces' vicious interference and moves for aggression under the pretext of "protecting human rights." 
					
					 The DPRK's working people abroad and their families are now expressing irrepressible resentment at the U.S., Japan and other hostile forces spreading the fiction about "abuse of the rights of its workers abroad" for the purpose of increasing the pressure upon the DPRK over the issue of "human rights".
					
					 The "human rights standard" based on the American-style outlook on value can not be applied to the DPRK and it is absolutely unacceptable to use it for political purpose or as a precondition for exchange among countries and their development.
					
					 It is necessary to heighten vigilance against the U.S. and other hostile forces to realize its wild ambition for hegemony through pressure and aggression while internationalizing the "human rights issue" of other countries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Moves to Form U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Triangular Military Alliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Moves to Form U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Triangular Military Alliance
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. decided to sell weapons including more than 240 ship-to-air missiles (SM-3) worth 820 million U.S. dollars to Japan. Timed to coincide with this, the U.S. made much fuss transferring a battery of PAC-3 of its forces in Japan to south Korea and staged a large joint minesweeping drill with Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 This is aimed at pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase in a bid to provide a legitimate pretext for the presence of the U.S. forces in Northeast Asia and arms-buildup and put spurs to the formation of the U.S., Japan and south Korea triangular military alliance. 
					
					 The U.S. has long worked overtly and covertly to take an upper-hand of strength and military supremacy in Northeast Asia through the formation of the triangular military alliance and thus pressurize and contain the regional countries.
					
					 However, there are noticeable signs among regional countries expressing different views from the U.S. ones on a series of international matters, exercising their strong influences. A particular mention should be made of the fact that a dramatic change has taken place in the balance of force in the region as the DPRK proudly ranked itself among nuclear powers. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. is seeking a way out in establishing the triangular military alliance and missile shield in a bid to tighten its supremacy. It is the real intention of the U.S. to establish the triangular military alliance, use it as lever and springboard and thus realize its ambition for domination over Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to think twice over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its reckless military tie-up and nexus with Japan and south Korea and behave itself.

articles.title: Protest against Ruling Quarters Grows Stronger in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Ruling Quarters Grows Stronger in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Protest against the puppet ruling quarters of south Korea is growing stronger against their sycophantic and treacherous decision on THAAD deployment, according to south Korean media including News 1.
					 Actions against THAAD deployment are mounting high in Taegu and North Kyongsang Province, in particular, and the support rate for traitor Park Geun Hye is rapidly sinking. 
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is making a scream that it was punished in the election to the "National Assembly" and it would be bound to be defeated in the "presidential" election in case it loses popularity in Songju and other areas because of THAAD deployment.

articles.title: S. Korean On-line Newspaper Urges Park Geun Hye to Pay Heed to People's Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean On-line Newspaper Urges Park Geun Hye to Pay Heed to People's Mindset
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- An editorial urging Park Geun Hye to properly understand the people's mindset regarding the deployment of THAAD was posted on the south Korean on-line newspaper Voice of People on Thursday.
					 Recalling the strong criticism of Park rang out from the candle-light rally held in Songju County on Wednesday, the editorial said such unilateral decision on THAAD deployment can be made only by a dictatorial regime.
					
					 The regime's scenario to isolate the Songju County from the public by making much fuss over "undesirable outside forces" came to a flop in actuality, it said, adding:
					
					 Inhabitants of the county launched a movement to inform the White House of the public opinion that THAAD should never be deployed in any part of south Korea, to say nothing of the county. Such voices are even heard in Ullung Island and Tok Islets.
					
					 The retraction of the deployment plan has become a task of all south Koreans aspiring after peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In view of the situation, Park should personally meet the county residents, not calling for sacrifice for people's security.
					
					 What Park should do now is to properly understand the public mindset.

articles.title: U.S. Deploys B-1B on Guam
articles.content:
U.S. Deploys B-1B on Guam
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists, who are escalating hostile acts against the DPRK, deployed notorious nuclear strategic bomber B-1B in the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam on Saturday.
					 They openly announced that its deployment is to cope with the contingency on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have constantly deployed nuclear strategic bomber B-52H on Guam, the outpost for aggression of the DPRK under the pretext of "strategic balance" in the Asia-Pacific region and "military aid to allies."
					
					 They deployed B-1B on Guam for the first time in ten years.
					
					 The enemies are bluffing that they can mount a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK by letting fly B-1B over the Korean peninsula within 2-3 hours in contingency as it is 1.5 times in speed and two times in carrying nuclear bombs as compared with B-52H, which has already been deployed.
					
					 Such moves for bolstering nuclear force exposes again that the U.S. imperialists are making a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK a fait accompli.
					
					 This year alone they have worked hard to ignite a nuclear war unprecedentedly in history by mobilizing the "nuclear triad" and "six core major forces" under the groundless pretext of "north's provocation" and "threat".
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are staging extremely adventurous actual maneuvers to unleash the second June 25 Korean war by frequently introducing special operation force, nuclear strategic submarines and nuclear strategic bombers into south Korea and its vicinity. This is the present-day reality.
					
					 The deployment of B-1B on Guam proves that the U.S. imperialists are becoming all the more pronounced in their moves to topple down the DPRK by mobilizing all nuclear war hardware.
					
					 The ever-mounting moves of the U.S. imperialists to ignite a nuclear war are pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula into the uncontrollable and catastrophic phase.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is sharply watching the ill-boding military moves of the gangster-like U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Once the Korean People's Army with the nuclear treasured sword of justice is given an order, it will reduce all the U.S. imperialists' latest war hardware including B-1B to iron scraps a moment and reduce their bases in Asia-Pacific region for aggression against the DPRK to a sea of flames.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces should not act rashly.

articles.title: Actions of Koreans in U.S. against THAAD Deployment Unabated
articles.content:
Actions of Koreans in U.S. against THAAD Deployment Unabated
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. are staging strong actions against the U.S. and the south Korean regime's decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea, a factor of wrecking  peace and escalating military tensions on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 They started a signature campaign demanding the withdrawal of the deployment plan through the White House internet homepage on July 15.
					
					 In their petition they said the decision on THAAD deployment made despite strong opposition of the south Korean people will escalate the tension in Northeast Asia, rattle the nerves of the north and spark off arms race.
					
					 Now is the time to defuse tension through negotiations for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region, they said, urging the U.S. and south Korean authorities to cancel the decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 As of August 4 at least 55 000 people joined in the signature campaign which will last until August 14. The number is on the steady increase.
					
					 Inhabitants of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea are staging a signature campaign, and civic and social bodies and opposition parties expressed their will to proactively join in the campaign.
					
					 The Songju Committee for Checking THAAD Deployment on August 1 sent emails containing open questionnaires concerning THAAD deployment to the U.S. presidential candidates.

articles.title: Danger of Deployment of THAAD Warned by Chinese, Russian Experts
articles.content:
Danger of Deployment of THAAD Warned by Chinese, Russian Experts
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Experts of China and Russia on military and political situation warned about consequences to be entailed by the U.S. deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					 The vice-president of the Institute for International Studies of China said at an interview with the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China that the south Korean authorities have adopted an imprudent stand the way of letting a wolf in, taking the lead in carrying out the U.S. Asia-Pacific rebalancing strategy.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities put their security in more harm's way through the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 The only U.S. will benefit from the THAAD deployment but south Korea will lose everything.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that south Korea will be the target of China and Russia in case of emergency.
					
					 The THAAD deployment in south Korea will cause serious consequences such as arms race and an increase of distrust in Northeast Asia.
					
					 A military expert of Russia said at an interview with internet news that the U.S. is trying to convince the public that the deployment of THAAD spawned by the "threat" from the DPRK but in fact it is pursued under the strategic plan targeting China.
					
					 The Russian expert said that relations between China and the U.S. will become very complicated in case the THAAD is deployed in the Asia-Pacific region, adding that Russia and China expressed strong concern over the U.S. moves and agreed to take closer and shared counteractions.

articles.title: Russian News Service Speaks Highly of Kim Il Sung's Feats for War Victory
articles.content:
Russian News Service Speaks Highly of Kim Il Sung's Feats for War Victory
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The DV-Ros News Service of Russia reported the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for war victory on July 29 on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 July 27, 1953 was the day when the U.S. was defeated by the Korean army and people in the 3-year-long Korean war and inked the Armistice Agreement, the news service said, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK has emerged as a nuclear power with the possession of even H-bomb and a space power, always winning victories in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK has not changed in the least for dozens of years.
					
					 The U.S. has a shameful history of sustaining one defeat after another whereas the DPRK is proud of its tradition of always beating it hard.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists were defeated in the Korean war for the first time in its sanguinary 100-year-long history of wars. The Korean people's victory is the fruition of the wise leadership of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung, outstanding strategist and iron-willed brilliant commander. The exploits he performed by leading the war to victory will go down forever.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Denounces Park Geun Hye Group for Deciding to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Denounces Park Geun Hye Group for Deciding to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily on August 3 in an article titled "Deliberate intention to hurt China's security and interests is intolerable" denounced the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea for its foolish decision to introduce U.S. THAAD into south Korea.
					 The U.S. and south Korea claim the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea is to cope with the "nuclear issue" of the DPRK, but their real intention is to destroy security structure in Northeast Asia, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Due to the decision on THAAD deployment, the support rate for Park Geun Hye is going down continuously in south Korea and its people strongly protest against the regime, saying that it sold off the interests of the country.
					
					 THAAD deployment brings no interest to south Korea, and China will never remain an onlooker to the issue.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korea persist in their maneuvers, China and Russia will take a measure they can neither imagine nor control.

articles.title: German Body Urges South Korean Regime to Repatriate DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
German Body Urges South Korean Regime to Repatriate DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany sent a letter of protest to the south Korean puppet embassy in Berlin on Aug. 1.
					 The letter said:
					
					 We denounce the south Korean regime for committing such an inhumane act as abducting a group of the DPRK citizens.
					
					 This barbarity reveals the inhumane nature of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south Korean regime, which has resorted to smear campaign against the DPRK, makes no scruple of committing such medieval human rights abuse as abducting a group of the DPRK citizens.
					
					 The south Korean regime should not be let go scot-free as it turned down the request of the families of the abducted citizens for access to their beloved daughters.
					
					 We urge the south Korean regime to immediately repatriate the DPRK citizens to their country and families.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the south Korean regime's inhuman acts being committed despite its spurious signboard of "freedom, democracy and human rights".

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Laud Kim Il Sung's Idea on Great National Unity
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Laud Kim Il Sung's Idea on Great National Unity
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Aug. 1 on the 25th anniversary of publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation".
					 In the work the President indicated the tasks and ways to achieve the great unity of the entire Korean nation, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The history of the reunification movement of Korea testifies to the validity and vitality of his idea and line on the great national unity.
					
					 His idea on the great national unity is materialized in the Juche-oriented line and policy for the national reunification Marshal Kim Jong Un advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: War Victory Day Marked by Political Party, Organizations of Belarus
articles.content:
War Victory Day Marked by Political Party, Organizations of Belarus
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus made public a joint statement on July 13 to mark the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The heroic Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists were forced to sign the Armistice Agreement after admitting their military defeat on July 27, 1953.
					
					 Since then much water has flown under the bridge, but the U.S. imperialists have refused to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and withdraw the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 They have turned a deaf ear to the unanimous demand of the Korean people for an independent reunification of the country under the banner of national independence.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are running high fever in their anti-DPRK psychological warfare while ceaselessly introducing war equipment into south Korea to realize the wild ambition for world domination.
					
					 They are staging large military drills on the ground, seas and in the air above south Korea to stifle the DPRK, far from disbanding the illegal "UN Command."
					
					 However, the DPRK is confidently advancing along the road of socialism of Juche under the leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the cause of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders.
					
					 We warmly congratulate the Korean people on the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 We call upon the world peace-loving people to fully support the struggle of the brave Korean people.

articles.title: Nature Museum, Central Zoo Introduced by Russian Media
articles.content:
Nature Museum, Central Zoo Introduced by Russian Media
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Russian media introduced the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo of the DPRK on July 29 and 31.
					 The Russian internet news Edednevnie Novosti Vladivostoka said in an article titled "Nature Museum and Central Zoo Change Appearance of Pyongyang":
					
					 The Nature Museum covering over 35 000 square meters houses the Space Hall, Paleozoic Era Hall, Mesozoic Era Hall, Cenozoic Era Hall, Animals Hall, Plants Hall, Gifts Hall, E-Library and Sci-tech Disseminating Room to give correct understanding and broad knowledge about nature to the people.
					
					 More than 40 animal sheds such as the Shed of Reptiles, Shed of Monkeys, Shed of Beasts, Shed of Elephants, Shed of Giraffes and Shed of Small Horses in the Central Zoo have been built in a peculiar and modern way to match the surrounding scenery. 
					
					 The Nature Museum and the Central Zoo are leisure complexes for the people and mass educational bases built according to the far-reaching plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a highly civilized nation.
					
					 Russian internet news Bezformata. Ru and Bremya Peremon posted similar articles.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con los participantes en III conferencia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con los participantes en III conferencia
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los participantes en la III Conferencia de Activistas del Movimiento por el Titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Cuando el Comandante Supremo llego al lugar de filmacion, los participantes le dieron calida bienvenida dirigiendo maxima gloria y saludos de agradecimiento.
					
					Kim Jong Un saludo cordialmente a ellos con su mano alzada.
					
					Se fotografio junto con los participantes luego de felicitar a ellos que hicieron aporte a defender a ultranza el Partido y la Revolucion en la linea avanzada de defensa de la patria y a fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio ideo-politico y tecnico-militar del EPC.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran con su responsabilidad y mision asumidas en convertir todas las unidades del EPC por el estilo de Septimo Regimiento de la Guerra Antijaponesa y de las vanguardias del tiempo de guerra al defender y glorificar la idea y las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre el movimiento masivo de los militares de direccion y producir un nuevo viraje en el movimiento por la obtencion del titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su y Pak Yong Sik.

articles.title: Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes acoge 30o aniversario de fundacion
articles.content:
Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes acoge 30o aniversario de fundacion
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes de Corea acogio el 30o aniversario de su fundacion. 
					Los funcionarios y creadores de esta entidad, fundada el 7 de agosto del 75 (1986) de la Era Juche, cumplieron durante 30 anos con la mision y papel de abanderados del frente ideologico del partido. 
					
					Los pintores hicieron aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de eternidad del lider al describir en el maximo nivel los retratos de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa. 
					
					Crearon ademas excelentes obras que se exhibieron en el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Hospital de Pediatria Okryu, el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas, el Museo de Sinchon, el Pabellon Central de Educacion Clasista y otras creaciones monumentales. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 el acto conmemorativo del 30o aniversario de la entidad.

articles.title: ACNC condena intervencion de EE.UU. y Japon en asuntos internos de RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC condena intervencion de EE.UU. y Japon en asuntos internos de RPDC
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- EE.UU. y Japon tratan de manchar la imagen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que "no se aseguran los derechos humanos de los obreros norcoreanos" que trabajan en el extranjero. 
					Hace poco, el portavoz del Departamento de Estado norteamericano encargado de asuntos de Asia Oriental y Pacifico expreso que "las ganancias obtenidas a traves del envio de obreros norcoreanos al extranjero afluyen al gobierno del Norte de Corea y se invierten en el ilegal programa de armas nucleares y misiles" y agrego que este tema se reflejara en la sancion anti-RPDC. 
					
					Siguiendo el ejemplo de su amo, Japon tambien intenta aprobar un "proyecto de resolucion" para la suspension del envio de obreros norcoreanos al extranjero. 
					
					Ya habia fracasado en su intento de incluir en el "proyecto de resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, aprobado en enero pasado, el tema de prohibir el empleo de obreros norcoreanos por otros paises. 
					
					Una vez aprobada otra resolucion de sancion anti-RPDC en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en marzo del ano en curso, ese pais isleno sostuvo contactos con los paises receptores de los obreros norcoreanos para interrumpir a toda costa la contratacion. 
					
					Es una conducta descabellada de los enviciados en la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					Hoy dia, el intercambio de fondos, tecnicas y mano de obra en las relaciones economicas entre los paises se hace una realidad general y nadie puede cuestionarlo. 
					
					Nuestros trabajadores, enviados al extranjero segun el contrato legitimo con los paises correspondientes y en el principio de voluntariedad, se esfuerzan por el desarrollo economico del pais y la ampliacion de intercambio economico exterior en las condiciones laborales y de vida, convenientes a la ley internacional y la nacional. 
					
					Calificandolo como "violacion de DDHH", las fuerzas hostiles arman alborotos en la escena internacional exigiendo a otros paises que no acepten a los obreros norcoreanos, lo cual es una flagrante intervencion en los asuntos internos de otros paises para alcanzar sus injustos objetivos. 
					
					Partiendo de sus intereses unilaterales enajenados de los derechos humanos, EE.UU. y los paises occidentales tildan de "violadores de DDHH" a los paises, que mantienen su regimen y modo politico propios, y les ejercen la presion en colectivo.
					
					Debido a la intervencion y agresion de las fuerzas hostiles que se perpetran en ambito mundial bajo el rotulo de la "defensa de DDHH", se ve violada la soberania de los paises y obstaculizado seriamente el desarrollo nacional de ellos. 
					
					Ahora, nuestros trabajadores en el extranjero y sus familiares en la patria estan muy indignados por el rumor de "violacion de derechos humanos de trabajadores en ultramar" que divulgan EE.UU., Japon y otras fuerzas hostiles a fin de intensificar la presion contra la RPDC en esta materia.
					
					Es inadmisible para la RPDC la "pauta de DDHH" basada en la concepcion del valor al estilo norteamericano. Y es intolerable su abuso en los fines politicos o como premisa de intercambio y desarrollo de los paises. 
					
					Hay que elevar la vigilancia sobre las maniobras de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles, encaminadas a realizar su ambicion dominacionista mediante la presion, la agresion y la internacionalizacion del "problema de DDHH" de otros paises.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun repudia la fabricacion de alianza militar tripartita
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun repudia la fabricacion de alianza militar tripartita
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Recientemente, EE.UU. decidio vender a Japon mas de 240 misiles buque-aire y otros armamentos valorados en 820 millones de US$. 
					Al mismo tiempo, traslado al Sur de Corea una posicion de PAC-3 que se hallaba en su base militar en Japon y libro junto con las "Fuerzas Maritimas de Autodefensa" de este pais el entrenamiento conjunto de dragado de minas de gran dimension. 
					
					Estos movimientos parten del intento de EE.UU. de llevar a la peor crisis la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana para preparar el pretexto legitimo del estacionamiento de sus tropas y el aumento armamentista en el Nordeste Asiatico y dar acicate a la formacion de la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea. 
					
					Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado este sabado y continua:
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. viene maniobrando de una manera u otra para completar la alianza militar tripartita a fin de tomar la hegemonia militar en la region del Nordeste Asiatico y mantener a rayas a los paises regionales. 
					
					En estos tiempos, los paises regionales elevan sus influencias dando senales de desacuerdo con EE.UU. en el tratamiento de algunos problemas internacionales.
					
					En particular, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea entro en la primera fila de potencias nucleares produciendo grandes cambios en la estructura regional de las fuerzas. 
					
					Muy inquietado, EE.UU. busca la salida en fabricar la alianza militar tripartita, establecer el sistema antimisiles y afianzar la hegemonia militar.
					
					Ese bloque serviria de plataforma de salto para realizar la ambicion norteamericana de dominar Asia y el resto del mundo. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia reflexionando seriamente de las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de la confabulacion militar con Japon y el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: EE.UU. ubica B-1B en isla Guam
articles.content:
EE.UU. ubica B-1B en isla Guam
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los imperialistas yanquis, que en los ultimos dias intensifican de manera escalonada sus actos hostiles anti-RPDC, ubicaron hoy el bombardero estrategico nuclear B-1B en la base aerea Anderson de la isla Guam. 
					Y hablan abiertamente que esto es la medida para hacer frente al tiempo emergente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Bajo el pretexto del "equilibrio estrategico" de la region Asia-Pacifico y la "asistencia militar al pais aliado", ellos vinieron estacionando permanentemente el bombardero B-52H en esa isla, base avanzada para la agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Pero, el emplazamiento del B-1B en Guam se efectuo por primera vez en los ultimos 10 anos. 
					
					Ahora, los enemigos echan fanfarronadas cacareando que el "B-1B" tiene la velocidad de 1.5 veces y la capacidad de dos veces de carga de bombas nucleares en comparacion con el B-52H y puede llegar dentro de 2 y 3 horas a la Peninsula Coreana para darle el ataque nuclear sorpresivo a la RPDC.
					
					Tales maniobras de aumento de las fuerzas nucleares vuelven a mostrar que los yanquis hacen como hecho consumado el golpe nuclear sorpresivo contra la RPDC.
					
					En el ano en curso, bajo el absurdo pretexto de  la "provocacion" y "amenaza" del Norte, EE.UU. se enfrasco en las maniobras sin precedentes para la provocacion de guerra nuclear movilizando los "3 medios de ataque nuclear" y "6 fuerzas combativas medulares". 
					
					Hoy en dia, las tropas agresoras norteamericanas introducen en repetidas veces las fuerzas armadas de las operaciones especiales, los submarinos y bombarderos estrategicos nucleares en el Sur de Corea y su contorno y realizan sin cesar los ejercicios extremadamente aventureros para provocar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					El emplazamiento de B-1B en la isla Guam testimonia el hecho de que se tornan mas imprudentes las perversas maquinaciones de los imperialistas yanquis para ocupar por via militar a la RPDC movilizando todos los armamentos mortiferos de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Tales maniobras provocativas que se hacen mas abiertas con el paso de los dias llevan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la incontrolable fase catastrofica. 
					
					El ejercito coreano observa con vista penetrante los extranos movimientos militares de los bandidescos yanquis. 
					
					Si se da la orden, el Ejercito Popular de Corea, armado con la espada omnipotente nuclear de justicia, convertira en un santiamen en chatarra todos los equipos belicos sofisticados del imperio yanqui inclusive B-1B y destruira completamente a las bases agresoras anti-RPDC de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas situadas en la region Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Los agresores yanquis deben actuar con prudencia.
